nls.name: Slow Page Top 20 Details Drill Down

query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:RESOURCE:URL_ACTION:URL_ACTION@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:RESOURCE:CASE WHEN MAX_RESP<=3000 THEN 0 WHEN MAX_RESP BETWEEN 3000 and 10000 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END:INDICATOR@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:RESOURCE:LOG_DATE:LOG_DATE@, @SELECT:METRIC:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:ROUND((MAX_RESP/1000),1):MAX_RESP@ FROM (SELECT URL_SHORT url_action, round(max(elapsed_time),0) max_resp, log_date log_date, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY round(max(elapsed_time),0) DESC) count_rank FROM LOG_DETAILS WHERE LOG_DATE=CAST(@WHERE:PARAM:XML:DATE:/data/log_date/@value@ AS DATE) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:XML:STRING:/data/hostname/@value@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:XML:STRING:/data/hostname/@value@=ENVIRONMENT) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:XML:STRING:/data/env/@value@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:XML:STRING:/data/env/@value@=ENVIRONMENT) AND @FILTER@ GROUP BY log_date, URL_SHORT HAVING @HAVING_FILTER@) WHERE COUNT_RANK<=20 AND ROWNUM<=20
